text: {{(() => { const capacity = Number(inpCapacity.text) || 1; const changeover = Number(inpChangeover.text) || 0; const data = getCuttingList.data || []; const rateM3PerMin = capacity / 480; let elapsed = 0; data.forEach((row, idx) => { const prev = idx > 0 ? data[idx-1] : null; if (prev && (row.timber !== prev.timber || row.profile !== prev.profile)) elapsed += changeover; elapsed += Number(row.volume_m3) / rateM3PerMin; }); const parts = (inpStartTime.text || '08:00').split(':'); const h = Number(parts[0]) || 8; const m = Number(parts[1]) || 0; const base = dpStartDate.selectedDate ? new Date(dpStartDate.selectedDate) : new Date(); base.setHours(h, m, 0, 0); const finish = new Date(base.getTime() + elapsed * 60000); const totalChangeovers = data.filter((r, i) => i > 0 && (r.timber !== data[i-1].timber || r.profile !== data[i-1].profile)).length; return 'Est. Finish: ' + String(finish.getDate()).padStart(2,'0') + '/' + String(finish.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0') + '/' + finish.getFullYear() + ' ' + String(finish.getHours()).padStart(2,'0') + ':' + String(finish.getMinutes()).padStart(2,'0') + '   (' + data.length + ' cuts, ' + totalChangeovers + ' changeovers, ' + Math.round(elapsed) + ' mins total)'; })()}}
